channel.title: Dular Mart - Baby Products Feed
channel.description: Premium baby products from Dular Mart - Perfect for Facebook Carousel Ads

item.g:title: Dular Mart Premium Silicone Feeding Mat - Large Size
item.g:description: Waterproof, non-slip silicone feeding mat with beautiful designs. Easy to clean, food-grade material. Perfect for messy eaters!

item.g:title: Dular Mart Heavy Duty Stroller Hooks - Pack of 2
item.g:description: Strong metal hooks for strollers, wheelchairs, and shopping carts. Hold up to 5kg each. Makes shopping hands-free!

item.g:title: Dular Mart Complete Baby Feeding Set - 5 Pieces
item.g:description: Complete feeding set includes bowl, spoon, fork, cup, and mat. BPA-free, dishwasher safe, beautiful colors.

item.g:title: Dular Mart Waterproof Baby Bibs - Pack of 3
item.g:description: Soft waterproof bibs with food catcher pocket. Easy to clean, adjustable neck, cute designs.

item.g:title: Dular Mart Educational Baby Toys - Sensory Set
item.g:description: Montessori-inspired sensory toys for baby development. Safe, non-toxic materials, various textures.
